article_title: Republicans to Lay Out Budget Priorities
article_text:
WASHINGTON—House and Senate Republicans release their 2016 budgets this week, mapping out a conservative blueprint for shrinking federal spending and challenging the vision laid out by President Barack Obama in his budget last month.

Congressional budgets are generally symbolic documents that don’t need to be signed by the president. But this year, full GOP control of Congress puts major policy changes within the scope of the budget...
